This place is amazing.  We stalked it b/c we discovered the night before that Cal Pep and El Xampanyet are very popular.  We got there before it opened and waited and got a great table.  There were four of us and we had at least 12 tapas each one better than the last.  The service was great, the atmosphere was invigorating and the wine and food were delicious.  You can't beat this.
